name: Paper Physics: Draw School
description:
It's time to use your Logic Puzzles brain and find a way to bump the Draw Ball: Line Draw 2
The rule's easy, just draw lines or shapes to bump the All Star, you will need your wisdom and imagination.
You'll surely love this game once you get how it works!
Features:
* You can also enjoy the fun of collecting pens Logic Puzzles
* Now try to get a higher score and share it with your friends!
* New levels update every week
* Free to play, play it anywhere anytime
* Suitable for all ages for Logic Puzzles
* Simple rules but a little difficult to clear the level, you'll find the addiction.
